title: Agent Orchestrator (AI Ops)
summary: Designs, runs, and monitors AI agents to execute business workflows safely—turning goals into reliable outputs with human oversight.
whyFutureReady: As agents become common, organizations need people who can define intent, tools, and guardrails.
Reliability, monitoring, and escalation stay valuable even as models improve.

items: Turn goals into step-by-step agent workflows with clear inputs/outputs.
Define tool access, memory, and boundaries.
Set acceptance criteria and QA checks.
Track failures, hallucinations, and edge cases.
Implement retries, fallbacks, and escalation paths.
Maintain logs and improve prompts/workflows over time.
Manage permissions and sensitive data rules.

proofProjects.title: Agent-run weekly report
whatYouBuild: Agent collects sources → summarizes → outputs a report with citations

proofProjects.title: Support triage agent
whatYouBuild: Categorize tickets → draft replies → escalate edge cases

starterPlan30Days: Build one agent workflow that saves 2+ hours/week and measure it.
Add a QA rubric + escalation rules.
Document the workflow so someone else can run it.
